website_summaries.verdict: About half the price of some other models, this dry brush is good for those looking for firm exfoliation.
pros: In addition to being a good value for its price, users praise this dry brush for helping improve circulation and making skin smoother
Most users felt it was a sturdy brush and appreciated the firm bristles
cons: Some consumers felt the bristles were too stiff, and there were occasional issues with the handle construction

customer_reviews.title: Great way to detox!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry brush once a week and it works great for that. I dry brush while a bath with 2 cups of epson salt and 1 cup of baking soda is filling. (A few drops of lavender EO is in my baths too) Using the bath and the dry brush is a great way to detox once a week. Make sure you drink a lot of water (full 8-16 oz) afterwards and stay hydrated the next day. This process will flush a lot of toxins right out of you. Baths with these things in then should be done in the evening as you’ll definitely be ready for a good sleep afterwards. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT, ESPECIALLY FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This brush is well made and the bristles are perfect, meaning they aren't as hard as nails nor are they too soft. I did knock a star off because, like others here, I wish they would have secured a cloth handle to the brush so when you aren't using the long handle (which in my case is 90% of the time), you could just slip your hand between the cloth handle and brush and do your thing. Minor complaint though and I would still recommend this product, which is very good, especially given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: NOT the brush that is depicted !
customer_reviews.text: This is not the brush as described or depicted. It is a different brush which is smaller in length, head size, and style!! I'm very disappointed. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AP1T

customer_reviews.title: Brush is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't understand that it is intended as a dry brush. I'm using it as a wet brush in the shower and liking it that way. Like most new brushes it's a bit stiffer than I like, but it will ease over time. It has a handle that needs to be pushed onto the brush head and it took me a couple of times to get it in firmly enough... now everything seems fine. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Wayman

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Body Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many body brushes - even the most expensive, yet I always come back to the Yerba Prima. It is the only one that gets the job done with intense body brushing. This brush is also so much more expensive at Whole Foods. Here it is such a great price and it totally makes a great gift! I bought one for a dear friend who was complaining about cellulite on her legs. She raved about the difference it made in her skin tone. Plus, it makes your skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I researched lots of dry brushes and in the end just had to choose. I went with this one because it is vegan and had a handle (which was essential for dry brushing during pregnancy when I was unable to reach my toes otherwise). It's not lost any bristles and has a nice firmness. I was worried about a brush being too stiff but this is perfect and I can adjust the stiffness somewhat by how much pressure I apply. I never experienced redness or irritation using this brush. The handle stays secure easily.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Dry Brush.
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are VERY rough. I would suggest this more for a male that wants to start dry brushing since men tend to have thicker and rougher skin. I had to use very light pressure when I started using it. I felt like the bristles softened after some use though. I don't want to give it a bad rating because it really is a good product, I was just new to dry brushing and didn't realize how rough the bristles should be before I bought a brush. Also another pro was that the handle stayed on very nicely while in use, the head didn't slip off which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren schmid

customer_reviews.title: Too scratchy!
customer_reviews.text: I considered this brush against several others but picked this one based on price and reviews. I saw many reviews saying that it's really rough but your skin gets used to it. Sadly, I didn't - maybe I'm a wimp?! Don't get me wrong, I love scratchy stuff that feels good and gets your skin clean. But after a week of every other day use, it just hurts - still. (And I'm a redhead = high pain tolerance!) I'm not happy and will be trying other brushes. To anyone trying this out, I hope you have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: twilily

customer_reviews.title: nice brush with multiple features
customer_reviews.text: i know i am supposed to brush my skin, it just took me a while to get around to it. i bought this brush and now really enjoy using it. its a little strange at first, brushing skin, especially since its not anything i grew up doing or knowing about, but it has really helped me relax and i hope to experience more benefits as i continue using this brush. it helps to have the long handle, the removable head and the strap on the back of the bristle head. its a nice brush and i think its well worth the investment considering the potential and likely results of regular brushing!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Mom

customer_reviews.title: Firm yet soft- great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I just love this brush. I was interested in dry brushing but other dry brushes hurt my skin to use and left me avoiding the task altogether. This brush, while firm, is soft enough that my skin can get used to it after a few tries. This handy brush has cleared up any little bumps on my skin and leaves me feeling better overall. Please note that you may get some in-grown hairs or bumps when doing any dry-brushing at first but after a little while, this stops.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Y

customer_reviews.title: Skin is nice and smooth! Improves texture!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. I have been using this on occasion and it really has helped improved the texture of my stretch marks, plus it does a nice exfoliation that doesn't seem to rough on the skin. You will have some slight redness, but after a shower and an hour or two it'll clear up, leaving your skin nice and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Mgonza

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong brush!
customer_reviews.text: This product is non returnable, so guess I'm stuck with it. Not at all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooths and exfoliates
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic brush. I use it before showering to get rid of dead skin- works great! My skin feels softer, seems more radiant, and I feel like it's smoothing out spots I used to think were bumpy and rough. An easy and fairly cheap way to take care of your skin- usually we put a lot of time and effort into our face and forget about the rest of our body- it needs love too!
customer_reviews.author: Sportsync

customer_reviews.title: It visibly scratches and damages your skin.
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are so hard on the skin they actually scratch it and I can see the scratches. As if that was not enough, the seller would not accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Way too scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Unless your skin is tougher than elephant hide, I don't recommend this. The bristles are extremely stiff and scratchy. I tried softening them up with hot water and soap. It didn't help. I don't know how they can call this a skin brush. Unless you want scratches all over your body, find a brush with softer bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I miss it when I don't have it. Feels so good to use, and I know I am getting rid of toxins that are eliminated with my dead skin flakes. So many of them come off with the brushing. No innocent animal was tortured to make this plant-fiber brush as it is with the "natural bristles.".
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I think my skin is better, not as itchy
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that you are not supposed to use this in thew shower, so it started getting mildew-ey, and the wood cracked. I now keep it out of the shower, and scrub my skin with it, and wash it off afterwards. I think my skin is better, not as itchy. But there is not really anyway way I can confirm that this is helping, as I am using Shea butter soap and other dermatological prescriptions too.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: This is a very excellent dry body brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a very excellent dry body brush. It is a very good sturdy brush. It is natural and I like the long handle for harder to reach places. If you are looking for a very brisk brushing, this is the brush for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I've had zero problems and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The Yerba Prima Tampico Skin Brush is just as described by both the seller and prior reviewers. This was my first time purchasing and using a dry body brush. I had done some prior research and had been given advice as what to look for. This Yerba brush met and exceeded all of my needs; natural bristals, removable back brush stick, right size, shape, and price. I've had zero problems and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BRZY

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! I had never used one before but I read the reviews and felt it was worth a shot. I brush every morning before I shower and I really love the wake up feeling it gives my skin. Also with the detachable handle it's easy for me to travel with it when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: K. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A Little Rough
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush, but it's a little too rough for me. I have to be extra gentle when exfoliating certain areas of my body. I also find the stick component more of an inconvenience than anything. I took it off the moment I got the brush, and I honestly don't know what I did with it. Might have thrown it away. I can reach all of the spots on my body without it. You may want to keep it for reaching spots on your back if you aren't terribly flexible. It does make my skin very smooth and I've noticed less skin issues (like ashy/dry skin) this winter. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: lsutigeralumna

customer_reviews.title: my skin loves it - especially in the winter
customer_reviews.text: I thought my looking at the picture, the handle would come off. It's just a picture to show how it is attached. But the handle does not get in the way when I grab the brush base. The bristles are not too soft or too rough When I notice my back getting dry and I can't reach it to put on lotion, this helps to use each morning before I shower. That is the best part to me. As we age our skin needs more attention. I'm 44 and I'm already noticing that lotion and moisturizing body wash is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It will lose its bristles
customer_reviews.text: Bristles started falling off after 30 days of use. The handle is sturdy and does remove from brush for ease of use. It was good for 30 days until it started falling apart. Soap that comes with it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: LCA

customer_reviews.title: Best dry brush for before the shower!
customer_reviews.text: Imma bought one for myself and loved it so much that I bought one for my husband. These are so great, so invigorating!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: This one is a hit!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years later, I still have this brush, it's still firm and I still love it! What more can I say really??? I haven't lost any bristles, the form is in tact and this gives me a really deep and stimulating scrub to help remove dead/dying cells. I like to sit on my porch and brush my body from toe to head while sipping water and thinking good thoughts...try it, you won't be disappointed! Oh I also like that the brush can be used with or without the handle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrid
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned two of these brushes, the first deserved a rating of 3.5 stars, but this second one smells like diarrhea mixed with vomit and B.O. Cons: Smells like vomit, diarrhea and B.O., does not go away after washing The bristles are very harsh at first but do soften up after a couple of uses The head of the brush does not stay on and will fall off occasionally There is a hole in the handle for a rope, but one does not come with the brush Pros: Very affective with good coverage and just the right amount of exfoliation once the bristles soften up
customer_reviews.author: cbf

customer_reviews.title: ... had one of these brushes before and it was perfect. I forgot it on vacation so I decided ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these brushes before and it was perfect. I forgot it on vacation so I decided to buy a new one from Amazon. The one I received is no good. It looks normal but the brush keeps slipping on the handle while it's hanging. It's fell so much that now the brush has a crack! Should've just went back to wholefoods where I bought the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Like cat scratches
customer_reviews.text: It was way too harsh, it did t exfoliate, it just scratched... like cat scratches! Oils to keep using it so I tossed it, at least it was biodegradable...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My skin has been better since I started
customer_reviews.text: My skin was sensitive to the brush the first couple times, but now I look forward to it every night. My skin has been better since I started,which is great because it's summer. Dry brushing is meditative, invigorating, and relaxing at the same time, and only takes a few minitems to do. Only problem I forsee is cleaning. Any tips would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: ge

customer_reviews.title: long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush over a year ago- great brush- bristles still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I was able to find a dry brush that ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a few days now and it definitely is effective. My skin is smoother and brighter. I'm so glad I was able to find a dry brush that wasn't made with boar bristles! Love that this is plant based.
customer_reviews.author: sra5012

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I always order this company's back brush. They last a long time and the bristles are the perfect hardness. Most back brushes are soft, but Yerba Prima Tampico makes them exactly how I like 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my skin brush!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this guy for a while now and it is finally time to replace (the wood started to split, but that is understandable after keeping it in the shower for a few years and it's constant exposure to water). Plus, it is probably time to get a new one anyway, so I would say it lasts plenty long. I noticed a difference in my skin texture after using this and it feels awesome. Skin brushing is so good for detox and health and is super easy to incorporate into your regular routine.
customer_reviews.author: Bonjour Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good starter brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brush, but at first I could only use it from the waist down and use a palm brush from the waist up. After a month I can use it on everything except my neck and clavicle area. I have definitely noticed softer skin, and a refreshed feeling after using this. It actually does get addicting which I am surprised about. I dry skin brush at night before showers and it works fine for me. A good way to unwind after work.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: This brush works great for dry skin removal which is what I am ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush works great for dry skin removal which is what I am using it for. The long handle is perfect for reaching my back. The brush head does slide off the handle frequently which has prevented me from being able to store it hanging from the end of the handle. I do like that it is removable though as hopefully I will be able to purchase a replacement brush versus the entire product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fox

customer_reviews.title: NOTE: This is "not for use in the shower"!
customer_reviews.text: The first tag direction should be shown on primary item description. "Dry skin brushing only, not for use in the shower". I meant to buy a shower brush and later found out that this brush was not even returnable. I wish I had my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. La Velle

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Feels sooo good on my skin. Great for skin brushing. It has reduced my cellulite dramatically. I've also started to use it to brush off my sheets before I go to sleep to get any crumbs/scratcy things off of them and it works really well for that too!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Vaught

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bonus feature is that you can pop the head off for a hand brush. Apparently some people have problems keeping the head on while using it as a back scrub. This is not a problem for me, and I scrub pretty hard. Perhaps other brushes suffer from poor manufacturing. The head is attached to the handle via a V-shaped notch. You just push the handle into the V. 1) I don't think they're pushing the pieces together hard enough when they put it together. 2) If it really is an issue, maybe scrub harder when you "push" the scrub then when you "pull".
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use this very often, but from the time I have spent using this brush I like it so far. Like some other reviews say, the bristles are a little stiff, but I don't think it's painful at all. It's more of a scratchy-tickle feeling and it makes my skin feel great and energized. Seems like a pretty good exfoliater, but it doesn't smooth away the little bumps on my upper arm as well as a sugar scrub does, but that could just be because I haven't used to very much yet. All in all I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: joc2804

customer_reviews.title: Great health aid!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the dry skin flakes the natural bristles brush away. My skin is softer and less itchy this winter. Because of it I use it before showering everyday. It took some getting used to the stuff bristles. They claim the bristles will get softer and I am experiencing that after using it for month...or my skin is adjusting. Love the health benefits of aiding my lymphatic system to flush toxins out of my system.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Thanks for a great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about dry brushing and didn't intend to spend a lot on a brush until I had made up my mind about it. Well, after receiving this brush, I LOVE dry brushing, and even love this brush! I have only used it twice, but already noticeably softer skin!!! The brush is firm enough for me, (I have very UNsensitive skin) but doesn't leave any scratches at all. The redness from brushing goes away in about 15 min. I was worried about not getting a firm enough brush, but this one is perfect! My other concern was the removable head, but it stays on great, no problems with it falling off. I highly recommend this, and will buy another!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get over the way this brush smells. It smells like vomit and feces. I tried cleaning it but the odor remains. Not sure if I received a defective or used item. I’m surprised other reviews don’t mention this. Sending back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: MoHall

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible! It is way too stiff and scratchy--similar to a scrub brush for the floor--and it has a strong, offensive odor. Totally unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great! It has stiff bristles - but that is what I was looking for on a dry brush.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brush after reading some articles online about dry brushing and one specifically recommended this brush. It gets the job done, but it was very scratchy- I thought more than it should be. Also, some of the bristles kept falling out.... Not a great product, but not a bad one- it gets the job done for me so I'm keeping it for now!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Garbe

customer_reviews.title: Body brushing for better health
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality brush. I got it for body brushing, as I had recently heard of this as a detoxing method. It was a different experience, but wasn't bad. I didn't know how, but found a couple how to videos on you tube to follow. It was pretty easy to figure out. This brush didn't hurt, but wasn't so soft that I couldn't feel it either. Also, it didn't "shed" as I was a little worried it might either.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee O.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I currently got into dry body brushing and this is my first one! I'm happy to say that I've noticed drastic changes on my skin as it became really soft and supple! I hope this works on my stretch marks too, we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Anna T

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this item again. I would try to seek out a different skin brush brand.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, this is my first skin brush so maybe dry brushing takes some getting used to. The bristles are so rough that it truly feels like I am scratching my skin. I would not buy this item again. I would try to seek out a different skin brush brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jade12

customer_reviews.title: PAINFULLY ABRASIVE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use as a dry brush. Huge mistake. It is actually painful to use. Whole Foods will not accept a return, so, since I don’t have a horse, this went straight to the landfill. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Umommi

customer_reviews.title: Its wonderful for what it was meant to use for but ...
customer_reviews.text: I screwed up and ordered the wrong brush, i use a shower brush everyday but had no idea i ordered this one by mistake. Its wonderful for what it was meant to use for but i like a little softer for my shower. Came on time and nice product. I will use them again for the correct brush.
customer_reviews.author: kathys chicago bears

customer_reviews.title: Nice Solid Brush
customer_reviews.text: I got this brush because I have heard that natural brush fibers are good for your skin. I've used it (not as often as I should because I forget) but so far I haven't noticed any improvement in my skin other than I have less dead skin on some trouble areas like my feet and elbows. However, I do love using this brush to scratch my back. It does a very nice job of being firm but not too firm. I may update this review after I have used the brush more often.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: It's literally like raking a bristled hair brush over your skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying drybrushing, and perhaps I don't understand the fundamentals enough, but this brush is SOOO hard. You do get used to it, but I would think it could be a little softer and still do the job. Again, I'm not really sure, but just know it's not even kinda soft on your skin. It's literally like raking a bristled hair brush over your skin...
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very nice. I was originally looking for one to use in the shower, but I like the idea of using a dry brush, so it won't get damp and moldy by hanging in the shower. I'm glad it is made with environmental concerns in mind. So far, the handle is very snug, so that detachable brush stays firmly in place. I've not needed to remove the handle yet. I've been using it for several months and it is also great for buffing hands, feet and nails. It conditions the cuticles.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kridler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to my skin care routine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! I love body brushing! I wanted to do more for myself than just exercise so I came across body brushing when I was reading up on detoxing. This brush definitely exfoliates, makes my skin soft and buffed away my scarred patches on my back. I sometimes use it before exercising, but mostly do a quick brush before jumping in the shower. My skin simply looks nicer so I know its working. I don't use any moisturizer afterwards. Not necessary! The bristles are coarse at first but they will soften up after a few uses. I use my facial black soap to wash it off after a few uses. Still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bernard
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem with these brushes. Since they are an add on item, the last time I needed one I ddin't have a large purchase to make from Amazon so I bought a Bernard Jensen one from my health food store instead. Felt like the bristles were wore out after the first use. I've seen some people complain about the stiffness of this brush, but that's how I like them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roth

customer_reviews.title: This feels strangely good when dry brushing your skin
customer_reviews.text: This feels strangely good when dry brushing your skin! I thought I wouldn't like it and would just have to tolerate it for the benefits of exfoliating and stimulating the integumentary system but it feels refreshing and good to use it and afterwards! I hope that it is true that this will help with the appearance of cellulite!!
customer_reviews.author: Christybee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dry brush
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic of dry brushing until I researched the topic and found this particular brush! I am a true believer in the benefits of dry brushing, as I see layers of dead skin falling off before I get into the shower. This is a great product, and it's gentle on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: KC_Reader

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Great skin brush. This is our second one. However it will start to fall off the handle it's not permanently affixed. Same thing happened with our other one.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: I loved this brush until the handle, made of wood, split apart and can no longer be used for my back - which was my intended purpose for buying this long-handled skin brush.
customer_reviews.author: L.Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dry brush (ing)
customer_reviews.text: Heard about "dry brushing", and wanted to try it, so I ordered this brush. Came in about a week, and I love it. Very sturdy, well made, and a good value. Makes my skin very soft and glowing, gives you an energy boost. Plan to order another if this one ever wears out! Love the long handle, too.
customer_reviews.author: BamaGirl4Life

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if there are better made ones on the market
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, weak construction. Just a month in with sporadic use, 2 sections of bristles fell out. The wood is also splitting in multiple spots where the handle inserts into the grove. Who knows how long before it splits entirely. I can't even get even satisfaction as a return/exchange/replace option expires quickly. I don't know if there are better made ones on the market, but this was seriously disappointing. Let's see if the manufacturer monitors feedback and sends me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce MC13

customer_reviews.title: Like this brush
customer_reviews.text: Really do like this brush. Had read about dry brushing for health purposes and someone reviewed this brush. Strong and long handle helps reach those hard to get to places, especially on your back. Pretty scratchy brissles. My experience is that the brush can hurt when I use it on dry skin. Feels better when I use it right after the shower, when my skin is still moist. Now is it improving my circulation and lymph nodes? I don't know but what the hell, it feels good!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: No handle
customer_reviews.text: Came without a handle. This is was a main reason why I ordered it. It’s also very thick and too “scratchy”.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia B.

customer_reviews.title: Skin Brush
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. The handle keeps slipping off. I'm also not sure How is best to keep it clean since it us a dry skin brush and not supposed to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Bath brush works well and is perfect for getting your back.
customer_reviews.text: Great bath brush. Perfect for washing your back. The head can occasionally pop off while your washing your back, but other than that it works well. The bristles are kinda hard dry, so I wouldn't recommend for dry brushing your body, but when it's wet and soaped up it feels nice on your back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alves

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It's very sturdy and the bristles are just stiff enough to give a good brush. I use this twice daily to as a lymph brush for my full body and can definitely tell a difference when I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Feels so great on my skin!
customer_reviews.text: It has begun to work on the bumps on my skin, but the more impressive thing about it is how much softer it has made my skin and how much dead skin (eeew!) it has removed from the back of my legs. I'm sooooooo happy with my brush!
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: This is very effective.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very effective, though my skin was very sensitive to this brush. I softened it by soaking the bristles in hot water. Skin brushing is so good for your skin's health and appearance, and I use this frequently. If you are sensitive, try starting with a skin puff made from nylon netting, dry. Then you should be better able to use this marvelous brush.
customer_reviews.author: pename

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My brush came completely intact. No bristles missing. I have used a few times and I would say is a very high quality dry brush for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: jackeyelaine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to purchase this product. The brush is durable and made with good quality materials. If you are new to dry brushing, it will feel rough to the skin. The brush will get better once you get used to it. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: Best Skin brush you can buy !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Yerba Skin Brushes over 15 years. I use them dry and wet. After using one for dry brushing for a year or two I start to use it as a bath brush. It works great. These brushes last for a long time and the bristles don't fall off. Sometimes the handle slides off, but I drove a small stainless screw through the handle into the body of the brush and that took care of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart too easily
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush, but when I hang it in my shower the head (brush) always falls off! I think I'm just gonna use wood glue on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandipants

customer_reviews.title: Very rough bristles to the point where it hurts to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very rough bristles to the point where it hurts to use on the skin weather dry or wet and leaves red marks on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sirvard

customer_reviews.title: best buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. I use it before every single shower and have the softest, smoothest skin. I'll never shower without using this first. I used to have these teeny tiny bumps after I shaved my legs but whenever I started using that skin brush I never got them anymore so I'm guessing it's because it exfoliates.
customer_reviews.author: April Denise Haywood

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Its sturdy. the bristles don't come out all over the place like some cheap brushes I've found. Its ROUGH but its the perfect amount of rough. I have sensitive skin too and my skin loves this brush. It'll make you're skin soft as butter. I don't use it everyday though, just every now and then. Maybe three or so times a week. (Not that I COULDNT use it everyday...I just forget) I had no issues with the top popping off or anything. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: fortherecord

customer_reviews.title: Super Back Scrubber
customer_reviews.text: OK, I would like the manufacturer to have a longer handle for this Tampico Skin Brush so I can use it as a proper back scrubber. But I found a solution for that problem. I bought a back brush with a long handle.After discarding its inferior brush, I used the long handle for the Tampico. The Yerba Prima Tampico Skin Brush is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Al-Radaniya

customer_reviews.title: The wood cracked after just 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. After just 4 gentle uses, the brush began to crack through the middle. I contacted both the seller and the company, no response from either. After only a week, now the handle won't even stay on because of the crack. I was planning on buying the brush for some other people, now I never will. I really expected better from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Nida Mohsin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, wet or dry. You can use oils as well to complement the brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Chalin

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Brush
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this tampico brush, well worth the investment. Feels great for a dry brush on body, and hands.
customer_reviews.author: BookLvr

customer_reviews.title: I love it. it has decreased the amount of neuropathy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how stiff the bristles were, never having one before, but I gently brush my arm where my damaged nerves are daily, sometimes twice daily. I love it. it has decreased the amount of neuropathy pain in my hand which I also brush daily. I like that it has a removable long handle. I would recommend this to others looking for a good skin and nerve brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day since I got it. It is holding up well. Not made to use wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush.
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for removing dead skin before showering (dry brushing), which is what I purchased it for). Does not scratch the skin, but stiff enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and I love that the brush includes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, and I love that the brush includes the removable handle! The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because it is already beginning to fray a bit, so I am a little concerned how long the brush will last. But for the price, it is still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Blum

customer_reviews.title: I like it dry
customer_reviews.text: Dry or wet, I love this brush. Handle is perfect length. It is scratchy when dry but oh so good for a back rub. I have read complaints about the handle coming off. Not a big deal, it was designed to come off. Just put it back on. You could use gorilla glue to keep it on if it annoys you. The handle comes off so you can use it in the palm of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: JoLawr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dry Skin Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush has just the right tension for me; effective when used lightly and also stands up to harder brushing. Well made with beautiful wood, the bristles are well set in the removable head. It would be nice to have a cotton strap on the back of the head like my old one had as it makes it easier to hold onto when using the head alone. Still, I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Horse

customer_reviews.title: Great for softer skin and I've also read lots about ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally sold on this skin brush. Great for softer skin and I've also read lots about the benefits for your lymphatic system. Be sure to use it on dry skin only. My family members each want their own now too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I really like this skin brush
customer_reviews.text: I really like this skin brush. It is bristles are just right to make your skin tingle. I went on a trip for a week and didn't bring it with me and I missed my morning brushing as it invigorates me in the morning. I gave it 4 stars because the brush would fall off the handle when I hung it up (the handle and brush come apart). So my husband drilled a hole where the handle and brush are together and inserted a peg to keep it from falling apart. Now it works great and I can still take the peg out if I don't want to use the handle with the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Only for veteran dry brush users.
customer_reviews.text: I fell into all the "dry brush" hype. I have regular skin, not too sensitive but not rough. This brush hurts! I cannot dry brush with this because it is too painful. Now, my husband on the other hand, loves it. If you are new to dry brushing or have sensitive skin, this is not the brush for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rukia

customer_reviews.title: Pinterest brought me here
customer_reviews.text: I heard about dry brushing on Pinterest. I have dry and bumpy skin but other kinds of exfoliating either don't work or are irritating. I like the long handle. It felt rough at first but I have gotten used to it. I notice a difference in my skin being less flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!! I can see a big change in ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW !! This thing is amazing !! I can see a big change in my skin after only one week of use ! My skin looks and feels much younger and less dry ! I look forward to it every day !!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly stiffer than I might like
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good dry skin brush, but I can barely use it on some parts of my body because it is too coarse. However, it is so good for the feet, knees, and elbows. Currently I use this lightly and mainly use a horsehair brush that is actually intended for polishing shoes. I like the horsehair one better because I can also use it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had/used this brush for for four days. In that time I’ve gotten a splinter from the raw wood handle and now the base where the bristles are attached has split. In addition, the vegetable bristles smell like onions. Since this is a non-returnable item I’m definitely at a loss. Pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Brushing
customer_reviews.text: I just started dry brushing and this has been wonderful. I don't find it to be too harsh, just control the amount of pressure you use. It's not painful at all to me but very invigorating! I have been using this for almost a month now and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: LavenderBraun

customer_reviews.title: Painful, Stiff Bristles
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely harsh. Even light brushing is painful. If the point is to make your skin red (causing circulation to all the layers of dermis), this definitely does the trick. It's just not enjoyable like one would expect skin brushing to be.
customer_reviews.author: Leena C.

customer_reviews.title: It takes a little getting use to
customer_reviews.text: Initially the brushing felt a little harsh and I thought I wouldn't be able to use it again. The second time I used it I was a little gentler and used softer strokes in a few areas, which felt better. Now after several uses I can brush areas on my skin without any pain. I tend to stick to brushing drier areas on my skin, that's where I see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: dellie

customer_reviews.title: Good Pre-Shower Routine
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brush for a few weeks now and love how easy it is to use. The handle is long enough for me to reach all areas of my back and my skin appears to be responding well to the pre-shower brushes.
customer_reviews.author: KC Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Wist, Glide, Shine
customer_reviews.text: This was given away as a gift but the overall construction seems well thought out and well executed. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Cjc97

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out after about 6-9 months of daily use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brush. For both, after about 6-9 month of use the bristles in the middle of the brush falls out. See pics. I use it twice daily for about 3 minutes each time to brush my body. I brush firmly but not enough that I would think the bristles should fall out so quickly. Product is good when all bristles are in tact, but fades to poor after regular use. There are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: rastacane

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I store this brush with the handle removed so it can completely dry out. I it use without the handle for most scrubbing, and insert the handle for as needed. It has an aggressive scratchy feel which might be a little much at first, but you soon get used to it and actually look forward to it. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you a looking for a nice moderately stiff brush, this is the one for you,
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

product_meta.title: Yerba Prima Tampico Skin Brush
feature_bullets: Wonderful, revitalizing health and beauty aid and one of the most powerful ways to cleanse the lymphatic system
Removes the top layer of dead skin and stimulating the circulation of blood feeding the skin are essential for maintaining youthful, glowing and supple skin
Gently and effectively removes the top layer of dead skin cells with its build-up of dirt and acid, and deeply cleanses the pores
Skin brushing is also used by spas and beauty salons as part of a program for removing cellulite and many women comment that their skin starts to look and feel smoother within a week or two
Skin brushing is most effective with an all-natural vegetable fiber brush, such as the Tampico Skin Brush

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
